author: Ambrose Yue
comment: Obviously eating the battery. Can't last for 1 days on my TicWatch S. Temperature display error. Send email to them for inquiry but no response.

comment: Pedometer does not work!!!! Use way to much battery

comment: Payment taken but installation not starting....

author: Phil Barnes
comment: It not showing me my bpm. Help
I use the functions every day.  Azus Zenwatch 2
title: Very nice

author: Daniel Du
comment: Time is too small, there is spare place to increase the digital clock. Another issue is why not can’t remove the dial. Already disable the clock hand but still have the clock dial. That is unsightly.
title: Good, but need to improve

author: Rich Phillips
comment: Need good eyes to read it all.  Battery lasts about 12-14 hours for me on Huawei without speakerphone update.
title: Tons of detail

author: Terry Fletcher
comment: Just wish heart monitor could be subed
title: Really like it

author: Steven Gebhardt
comment: I like this watch face. It has tons of detailed information displayed. Very useful! Great look!
title: Very nice

author: Mark P
comment: Great watch face, had a little problem at first would not Change colour solved it by reseting my phone (htc one m8) and my Sony smartwatch 3 then all was ok keep up the good work 😀
title: Stunning

author: ephraim bululu
comment: Some features do not work such as heart rate and wind speed and I can't say how accurate some of the features are...this needs more development.

reply.author: Smartwatch Bureaux
reply.content:
Thank you for your feedback.Sony's SmartWatch3 doesn't have the heart-beat sensor , so cannot show your heart-beat on that.
About the other questions,please feel free to contact our email address.I'd like to help you and improve the app.
Thank you.

title: Sony smart watch 3

author: Akeem Bruce
comment: This is a beautiful face, the only thing it's missing is a functional compass . The addition of a working compass would make it perfect. Would love to see that update.
title: Great watch face.

author: R stalls
comment: The step is WAY OFF please fix then rating will be way better

reply.author: Smartwatch Bureaux
reply.content:
Since the step counter have different sensitivity for each Android wear watch,
So would you please change the sensitivity of step counter.
Check AA48's setting screen.
For more information about it ,please feel free to contact out email address.
Thank you.

title: Step
